subject: Nordic Combined (Winter Sport Event)
World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: The World Cup champion Ronny Ackermann of Germany won the opener of the Nordic combined season in Kussamo, Finland. He was followed by Janne Ryynanen and Anssi Koivuranta, both of Finland. Bill Demong of the United States, third over all in the World Cup last season, was 27th.
